```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rio)
library(here)
library(colorblindr)


honey <- import(here("honeyproduction.csv"))

```

```{r Part1}
honey2 <- honey
state <- unique(honey2$state)
colorFill <- c(rep("Loser State or Illinois", 44))
stateColor <- as.data.frame(cbind(state, colorFill))
stateColor[4,2] <- "California"
stateColor[40,2] <- "Washington"
stateColor[32,2] <- "Oregon"
stateColor$colorFill <- factor(stateColor$colorFill, levels = c("California", "Oregon", "Washington", "Loser State or Illinois"))
honey2 <- left_join(honey2, stateColor, by = 'state')

honeyPlot <- ggplot(honey2, aes(x = totalprod, y = reorder(state, totalprod))) + 
  geom_col(aes(fill=colorFill))+ 
  scale_x_continuous(expand = c(0, 0)) +
  labs(title = "Total honey production by state")
honeyPlot
```


```{r Part2}
colorblindr::cvd_grid(honeyPlot)
```
